oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard from Sgt. Connie Marshall Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This picture postcard shows a small town with a high mountain in the background. A title reading "CHAMBERY -- Vue generale et le Nivolet -- L.L." is printed across the lower edge of the image. Sgt. Connie Marshall Williams, Co. E, 306th Engineer Regt. sent this post card to Mrs. J.C. Moore of Lexington, Tennesee. He briefly describes his Christmas with all of the soldiers "at this place were at the xmas tree at the Y.M.C.A." This would be the first Christmas since 1914 that Europe was not at war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
